channel.title: October 2026 on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in October 2026 on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: Retirement: Windows Server 2022 on Azure Kubernetes Service enabled by Azure Arc
item.description:
Microsoft announces the retirement of Windows Server 2022 on Azure Kubernetes Service enabled by Azure Arc in October 2026.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: Retirement: Azure Databricks Standard tier will retire by October 2026
item.description:
Microsoft announced the retirement of the Azure Databricks Standard tier. Creation of new Standard-tier workspaces will be blocked after April 1, 2026, and the Standard tier will be retired by October 1, 2026.

  • Source: Azure Updates
